transcript:
Customer: Ji Roshan ji bol raha hu namaste.
Executive: Aashish bol raha hu sir.
Customer: Actually phone me kuch kami aa rahi thi mera phone lag nahi pa raha tha aapke taraf se aawaz nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Chalo koi baat nahi main aapko ye bata raha tha aap jab bhi online aayenge na to aap review wala mere ko bheja nahi aap bhijwa dena main usko check karwa lunga theek hai wo main bheju sir.
Customer: Ha dusri cheez sir aapki jo call wagera aap pick kar rahe ho na.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Uska percentage bahut kam hai.
Executive: Sir call mere paas aa hi nahi rahi na.
Executive: To sir call aapke paas me aa rahi hai pichle mahine me na 27 call aayi.
Customer: Are lekin uska 27 call me sirf 13 call aap pick kare aur baki call aapne miss kar diya tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Right to hamara jo call pick up ratio hai wo bahut kam hai.
Customer: Achcha ji.
Executive: To please aap mujhe product pe kaam karana hai.
Customer: Ya to Nikki madam ko connect karunga subah ko aapko ya aapko connect karunga.
Executive: Nikki se call aapko karwa dunga morning me do teen cheeze hai sir wo aap mujhe bata do aapka ek product hai kasa thali.
Customer: Ha wo mera.
Executive: Main plus architect to iska sir material kaun sa hota hai brass.
Customer: Nahi ye bronze hota hai aur bronze ban gaya hai bronze copper plus tin ke combination me.
Executive: Achcha B R O N Z right.
Executive: B R O N Z e bronze bronze bronze iska dimension kya hota hai sir 5 inch 6 inch kitna dimension hota hai.
Customer: Ye sir kai size hota hai.
Executive: Fir bhi jaise aap normally jo hai normal standard size.
Customer: Normal standard size 12 inch.
Executive: 12 inch.
Customer: Chalo aur design sir round hota hai ye to.
Executive: Size round hota hai ha round hota hai.
Executive: To color golden hota hai.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Right ye handmade hota hai sir.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ye handmade hota hai na.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Chalo sahi hai aur sir aur do char product ke aap mujhe kuch bata do ye jaruri hai ek copper bath tub hai type of bath tub kaun sa jetted bath hai soaking tub hai kya hai.
Customer: Ye sab cheeze main subah batau main kahin kahin aaya hua tha.
Executive: Actually na sir aapka ek concern pending hai aur isme hame ye sab thoda update karna jaruri hai aapne customer care pe call kiya tha na.
Customer: Na customer care pe maine is vajah se phone nahi kiya tha are mujhe kuch cheeze add karni hai lekin fursat se lamba time hai main is time highway pe tha.
Executive: Achcha to aapka abhi jo concern open hua tha ye concern main aapka band kar du.
Customer: Ha band kar dijiye main subah kar lunga.
Executive: To aapke paas me feedback chali jayega please aap feedback jarur share kar dijiyega.
Customer: Best sir best sir.
Executive: Baki sir do char cheeze aapko dhyan rakhni hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Right aapke paas me leads wagera to aap achcha consume kar rahe ho leads wagera me kahin koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na aap call wagera sir please pick kara kijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Call pick karna bahut mushkil ho gaya hai matlab nahi miss kar rahe ho to bahut dikkat ho jayegi sir.
Customer: Sahi sahi hai.
Executive: Right baki kisi tarah ki koi dikkat hogi to please aap mujhe batayega.
Customer: Main main karta hu sir.
Executive: Okay sure sir sure thank you sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's phone was not connecting properly.

- Call pickup ratio is very low.

- Wants to know about product Kasa Thali.

- Wants to add some products to his catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to get the review checked.

- Executive informed about low call pickup ratio.

- Executive offered a call from Nikki madam.

- Executive closed the concern and asked for feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide details in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- call pickup, product details, concern, feedback
